mapper.select: select PNO, PNAME, STA_DATE, END_DATE, STATE from PROJECTS order by PNO desc
mapper.insert: insert into PROJECTS(PNAME, CONTENT, STA_DATE, END_DATE, STATE, CRE_DATE, TAGS) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 0, now(), #{tags})
mapper.select: select PNO, PNAME, CONTENT, STA_DATE, END_DATE, STATE, CRE_DATE, TAGS from PROJECTS where PNO = ${value}
mapper.update: update PROJECTS set PNAME = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, STA_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, STATE = #{state}, TAGS = #{tags} where PNO = #{no}
